1.title: JB SQUARE Opens New Bio-Incubation Center
1.description: A new state-of-the-art facility is now open to support early-stage biotech startups with labs and mentoring programs.

5.title: Notice on Corporate Tax Reduction for Bio-Ventures

1.name: HelixGene

1.title: Corporate & Local Tax Holiday
1.description: Full exemption on corporate/income tax for 5 years, followed by a 50% reduction for 2 years for investments in Saemangeum.

2.title: Large-Scale Cash Grants
2.description: Receive direct cash support up to KRW 10-20 billion from provincial and city governments for large investments.

3.title: Hiring & Training Subsidies
3.description: Up to KRW 1.5 million per employee for hiring and KRW 1 million for training when hiring over 20 local residents.

4.title: Land & Site Support
4.description: Up to 100% reduction on rent for industrial sites in Foreign Investment Zones (FIZ) for up to 100 years.
